org.modelio.api.modelio.diagram

Interface IDiagramCustomizer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultDiagramCustomizer

    public interface IDiagramCustomizer
    This interface is used to define a diagram palette for a module.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fillPalette(PaletteRoot paletteRoot)
      Define the palette content by adding groups and tools in it.
      default IDGDynamicDecorator getDynamicDecorator()
      Optional decorator for diagram graphics in the customized diagram.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getParameters() 
      void initialize(IModule module, java.util.List<PaletteEntry> tools, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> hParameters, boolean keepBasePalette)
      Initialize the customizer.
      boolean keepBasePalette()
      Indicates whether the 'standard' content of the diagram palette must be kept or flushed when opening this stereotyped diagram.

    • Method Detail

      • keepBasePalette

        boolean keepBasePalette()
        Indicates whether the 'standard' content of the diagram palette must be kept or flushed when opening this stereotyped diagram.
        Returns:
        true when the 'standard' content of the diagram palette must be kept.

      • fillPalette

        void fillPalette(PaletteRoot paletteRoot)
        Define the palette content by adding groups and tools in it.
        Tools can be custom (i.e. added by modules) or standard tools, usually named after their metaclass (like 'CREATE_NOTE').
        Parameters:
        root - The root PaletteEntry for the palette model.

      • initialize

        void initialize(IModule module,
                java.util.List<PaletteEntry> tools,
                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> hParameters,
                boolean keepBasePalette)
        Initialize the customizer. Called right after the constructor. Passed values are collected from the module.xml definition of the customizer.
        Parameters:
        module - the module this diagram custimizer comes from.
        tools - tools defined in the diagram definition.
        hParameters - parameters defined in the diagram definition.
        keepBasePalette - whether or not 'standard' content of the diagram palette should be kept.

      • getParameters

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getParameters()
        Returns:
        the handler parameters as defined in the module.xml file

      • getDynamicDecorator

        default IDGDynamicDecorator getDynamicDecorator()
        Optional decorator for diagram graphics in the customized diagram.

        With a decorator, it becomes possible to dynamically overwrite graphical property on any unmasked element.

        Returns:
        an instance of IDGDynamicDecorator.
        Since:
        3.6
